page.title: 04New Families In Rufforth
page.content: Rufforth School has registerd six children from new families which have moved to Rufforth in the last{eighteen {months.}The six families moved for reason of employment.One out of the six regrets the move,but all think Rufforth is a friendly village.Four families have{new houses}and two have {old ones.}All the families own their house. Four of the families thought of living somewhere else. In Rufforth there are about {twenty six new {families}including the ones in school.Fifteen out of the twenty six families live in a small development. Out of the twenty six,seven families moved into a newly-built house.One of the new families moved into the villge shop.All but one came because of the house.
